# Mapper.IgnoreProperty method

Checks if the property should be ignored

```csharp
private static bool IgnoreProperty(this MemberInfo propertyInfo)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| propertyInfo | The property info |

## Return Value

true when the property should be ignore, otherwise false
